title: Caregiver burnout detection and prevention
content:
Scenario: Caregiver burnout detection and prevention
    Given caregiver burnout is real and dangerous
    And James is at risk of physical and emotional collapse
    When the personal_agent monitors for burnout warning signs
    Then it should detect declining nutrition in James
    And it should recognize sleep deprivation patterns
    And it should notice increasing social isolation
    And it should identify health problems emerging
    And it should alert James before burnout becomes crisis
    And it should proactively connect him to respite resources
